wtomigraj

Class AddrInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtomigraj.AddrInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AddrInfo>

    public class AddrInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AddrInfo>
    Class AddrInfo keeps IP address and port in one object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddrInfo(java.net.InetAddress iaddr, int port)
      Constructs AddrInfo object from address and port.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(AddrInfo o)
        Method compares this and given address. First it compares addresses, if they are equal it compares ports.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<AddrInfo>
        Parameters:
        o - Other AddrInfo object.
        Returns:
        -1 when this object is lexicographically first, 1 if it second, 0 when addresses are equal.
